sentences.en: 13 people were summarily executed (= killed without any trial or legal process ) by the guerrillas.
sentences.cn: 有13人被游击队员就地处决。

sentences.en: Execute the law after personnel is registered to its, their demobilization.
sentences.cn: 执法人员对其登记后, 将他们遣散.

sentences.en: If I don't execute my commission, she'll tear my eyes out.
sentences.cn: 我如果不执行我这个使命, 她会把我的眼睛都挖出来的.

sentences.en: If the main purpose of menus were to execute commands, terseness would be a virtue.
sentences.cn: 如果菜单的主要目的是执行命令, 那么就应该精练.

sentences.en: It is difficult to execute turns with rudder control alone.
sentences.cn: 单靠操纵方向舵转弯是困难的.

sentences.en: Its price structure is simple to understand and simple to execute.
sentences.cn: 其价格结构简单易行,其房价有五等,但在多种销售渠道中是连贯一致的.

sentences.en: Loosely - speaking, computers can only execute programs written in low - level languages.
sentences.cn: 坦率而言, 计算机仅能执行用低级语言编写的程序.

sentences.en: Make sure that you execute all movements smoothly and without jerking.
sentences.cn: 一定要保证所有动作自然流畅，不要一顿一顿的。

sentences.en: Next according to the instruction different, execute different operation.
sentences.cn: 然后按照指令的不同, 执行不同的操作.

sentences.en: Obviously you have to execute these sentences against your database.
sentences.cn: 很明显,你需要在数据库中执行以上代码.

sentences.en: The general gave the word to execute the deserters.
The job involves drawing up and executing a plan of nursing care.
sentences.cn: 这项工作包括拟订和实施一个护理计划。

sentences.en: The skaters’ routine was perfectly executed.
sentences.cn: 滑冰选手把整套动作完成得非常出色。

sentences.en: The Windows allow a computer user to execute multiple programs simultaneously.
sentences.cn: Windows允许计算机用户同时运行多个程序.

sentences.en: The Windows allows a computer user to execute multiple programs simultaneously.
sentences.cn: Windows操作系统允许计算机用户同时运行多个程序.

sentences.en: To execute any caprice or order of her patients is her chiefest joy and reward.
sentences.cn: 执行病人的任何离奇想法或命令,是她的最重要的欢乐和酬劳.

sentences.en: We should execute and destroy such veritable fiends and dregs of humanity.
sentences.cn: 我们应当处决并消灭这种不折不扣的魔鬼,人类的渣滓.

words.tran_cn: 行政的；经营的；执行的，经营管理的
经理；执行委员会；执行者；经理主管人员
执行者；[法] 遗嘱执行人

trans.tran_en: to kill someone, especially legally as a punishment

trans.tran_cn: 处死， 处决； 实施， 执行； 使生效
trans.tran_en: to kill someone, especially legally as a punishment
